item.title: Google Translate Bookmarklet
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Google Translate is a really handy tool. Generally my use revolves around translating web sites instead of raw text. So I was pretty excited to find a set of Google Translate bookmarklets a few weeks back. This saves me a trip over to the Google Translate page just to enter in the URL that I’m […]
item.content:encoded:
Google Translate is a really handy tool. Generally my use revolves around translating web sites instead of raw text. So I was pretty excited to find a set of Google Translate bookmarklets a few weeks back. This saves me a trip over to the Google Translate page just to enter in the URL that I’m already looking at.

Now, what’s up with Gmail and Google Translate? There’s been rumor of translation features being added to Gmail for the better part of a year, but so far I haven’t seen it. How am I supposed to read all of this Russian spam if I can’t easily translate into English?
